DOC.brief_title: LEAN Project : Weight Loss Appetite Suppression
DOC.detailed_description: Participants randomize either control treatment group take dietary supplement contain soy lecithin-derived N-oleoyl-phosphatidyl-ethanolamine ( NOPE ) caffeine free Green Tea-derived epigallocathchin gallate ( EGCG ) whose trade name PhosphoLean . The outcome determine effect index weight loss appetite suppression . Participants return 6 , 12 , 16 week clinical measure .
